data.name: 星空列车与白的旅行 Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This is the Original Soundtrack from the game "星空列车与白的旅行"!

Theme song
"Star Trip"
Lyrics: Megumi Hoshina / Shiratama
Composer: Koho Maruyama
Arrangement: Yuichi Nanase, Komei Maruyama
Song: Megumi Hoshina
sound produced by project lights
data.about_the_game:
This is the Original Soundtrack from the game "星空列车与白的旅行"!

Theme song
"Star Trip"
Lyrics: Megumi Hoshina / Shiratama
Composer: Koho Maruyama
Arrangement: Yuichi Nanase, Komei Maruyama
Song: Megumi Hoshina
sound produced by project lights
data.short_description: The train you took, piercing the night sky and galloping under the stars, was refreshing-it was really a great value trip. In the solo journey under the refreshing night breeze, I met casual passengers and the loving and loving flight attendants.

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy 星空列车与白的旅行 Soundtrack
